verbs.description: [ARG0: Justice Department Inspector General Michael Horowitz] [V: confirmed] [ARGM-MNR: publicly] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARG1: that his office is investigating James Comey for his handling of classified information as part of memos he shared documenting discussions with President Trump] .
